tasks.title: Update roadmap for Q1
tasks.description: Update the Q1 roadmap to reflect that onboarding revamp is now the top priority and the advanced analytics pilot should be pushed to March.
tasks.evidence: Mira, please update the roadmap to reflect that, and push analytics pilot to March?

tasks.title: Define 3 concrete KPIs for onboarding success
tasks.description: Identify and propose 3 specific Key Performance Indicators to measure the success of the onboarding process, aiming for metrics that can be measured within 30 days.
tasks.evidence: Mira, I want 3 concrete KPIs to measure onboarding success within 30 days. Can you do that by tomorrow morning?

tasks.title: Plan lightweight usability tests for new onboarding prototype
tasks.description: Organize a small-scale usability test (maximum two sessions) once the new onboarding prototype is ready.
tasks.deadline: After new onboarding prototype is ready
tasks.evidence: Leah: Should we plan a quick usability test after the new onboarding prototype is ready? Nothing big, like two sessions max? Jeffy: Sounds good. Keep it lightweight.

tasks.title: Complete backend changes for onboarding
tasks.description: Engineering team to finalize backend modifications required for the new onboarding flow.
tasks.evidence: Arun: Engineering can do backend changes this week...

tasks.title: Complete UI changes for onboarding
tasks.description: Engineering team to finalize UI modifications required for the new onboarding flow.
tasks.evidence: ...and UI next week.

tasks.title: Prepare for internal onboarding demo
tasks.description: Engineering team to prepare the core onboarding flow, with backend integrated and UI mostly done, for an internal demonstration.
tasks.evidence: We're aiming for a Thursday internal demo.

tasks.title: Ensure consistent internal messaging regarding onboarding launch
tasks.description: Communicate internally that the onboarding update will be a silent launch without external marketing, and maintain consistent messaging.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Silent. No ads or blog posts. Leah: I'll keep messaging consistent.

tasks.title: Deliver design assets for onboarding
tasks.description: Provide the necessary design assets to Arun's engineering team for the onboarding development.
tasks.evidence: Arun: Waiting on design assets tonight. Leah: You'll have them by 8 PM.

tasks.title: Instrument detailed funnel tracking for onboarding
tasks.description: Implement detailed tracking mechanisms to identify specific drop-off points within the user onboarding funnel.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: What about drop-off points? Mira: We'll instrument detailed funnel tracking to spot where users leave.

tasks.title: Implement A/B test for deferring onboarding permissions
tasks.description: Develop and set up an A/B test variant for the onboarding flow that defers certain permission requests to a later stage to reduce friction.
tasks.evidence: Mira: That could reduce friction. Should we test that variant? Jeffy: Yes, put that in as an A/B test post-launch.

tasks.title: Design explanatory microcopy and tooltips for permission screen
tasks.description: Create additional microcopy and short tooltips to clarify the necessity of upfront permissions on the onboarding screen, addressing user confusion.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Could we add more explanatory microcopy? Daniel: ...adding short tooltips could help here. Jeffy: Sounds good, Daniel. Can you work on that?

tasks.title: Record usability test sessions
tasks.description: Ensure all planned usability testing sessions for onboarding are recorded for later analysis.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Excellent. Make sure to record sessions for analysis. Leah: Already planned.

tasks.title: Draft internal messaging regarding analytics pilot delay
tasks.description: Prepare communication for internal teams to manage expectations about the advanced analytics pilot being pushed to March.
tasks.evidence: Mira: ...analytics pilot push might disappoint marketing. Jeffy: ...Leah, please help draft messaging to internal teams.

tasks.title: Fix data pipeline bugs for analytics
tasks.description: Utilize the extra time gained from delaying the analytics pilot to identify and resolve bugs in the data pipeline to improve data accuracy.
tasks.evidence: Arun: ...can we use this time to improve data accuracy? Jeffy: Absolutely. Use the extra time to fix data pipeline bugs.

tasks.title: Create a deck summarizing roadmap update
tasks.description: Prepare a concise presentation deck outlining the key changes and dates for the updated Q1 roadmap.
tasks.evidence: Mira: For the roadmap update, do you want a formal doc or just a quick deck? Jeffy: Deck with key changes and dates. Keep it tight.

tasks.title: Prepare to field questions for onboarding demo
tasks.description: Mira, representing Product, should be ready to answer questions during the internal onboarding demo on Thursday.
tasks.evidence: Mira: Will product be ready to field questions? Jeffy: Yes, Mira, you should be prepped.

tasks.title: Prepare user feedback snippets for onboarding demo
tasks.description: Compile and prepare quick user feedback snippets to present during the internal onboarding demo.
tasks.evidence: Leah: I can prepare quick user feedback snippets for the demo. Jeffy: Perfect.

tasks.title: Collating, prioritizing, and updating sprint backlog based on demo feedback
tasks.description: Gather feedback from the internal demo, prioritize action items, and update the sprint backlog accordingly.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Demo feedback gets collated, prioritized, and sprint backlog updated.

tasks.title: Invite Customer Success team to onboarding demo
tasks.description: Extend an invitation to the Customer Success team to attend the internal onboarding demo.
tasks.evidence: Leah: Should we invite customer success team? Jeffy: Yeah, good idea.

tasks.title: Conduct smoke tests for onboarding
tasks.description: The QA team is to perform smoke tests on the onboarding flow.
tasks.evidence: Arun: QA is prepping test cases for onboarding. Will do smoke tests by Wednesday.

tasks.title: Finish final icons for design assets
tasks.description: Complete the remaining icon designs needed for the onboarding project, which is currently a blocker.
tasks.evidence: Daniel: Yep, finishing final icons today.

tasks.title: Review final design icons
tasks.description: Review the final icon designs completed by Daniel.
tasks.evidence: Leah: I'll review those tomorrow morning.

tasks.title: Add 'ease of use' rating to post-onboarding survey
tasks.description: Incorporate a qualitative 'ease of use' rating question into the survey distributed to users after onboarding.
tasks.evidence: Mira: For KPIs, we might want to add qualitative feedback, like “ease of use” rating. Jeffy: Good call. Leah: We'll add that to post-onboarding survey.

tasks.title: Push for design intern recruitment
tasks.description: Advocate for and initiate the process to bring in a design intern to alleviate the current resource crunch in the design team.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Can we get an intern in design? Mira: I’ll push for it.

tasks.title: Speed up design intern hiring process
tasks.description: Expedite the recruitment and hiring process for the design intern, leveraging existing candidates from HR.
tasks.evidence: Leah: HR said they have candidates lined up. Jeffy: Cool, please speed that up.

tasks.title: Build onboarding as modular pieces
tasks.description: Develop the onboarding flow using a modular architecture to allow for easier future iterations and avoid extensive rewrites.
tasks.evidence: Mira: ...do we want to build onboarding as modular pieces for future iterations? Jeffy: Worth it. Build modular to avoid rewrites later.

tasks.title: Design clearer error messages for onboarding
tasks.description: Develop improved designs for error messages within the onboarding flow based on user feedback.
tasks.evidence: Jeffy: Definitely a must. Daniel: Will work on error message designs next week.

tasks.title: Send weekly email updates to Marketing on onboarding progress
tasks.description: Provide regular weekly email updates to the Marketing team regarding the progress of the onboarding project.
tasks.evidence: Mira: Marketing still wants early heads-up on onboarding progress. Jeffy: Weekly email updates to them.

tasks.title: Coordinate compliance check for analytics data retention policy
tasks.description: Initiate and manage a compliance review with the legal team regarding the data retention policy for advanced analytics.
tasks.evidence: Arun: Need to clarify analytics data retention policy. Jeffy: Compliance check with legal. Mira: I’ll coordinate.

tasks.title: Add internationalization adjustments for visuals to backlog
tasks.description: Place the task of adjusting visuals for potential future internationalization support into the product backlog.
tasks.evidence: Daniel: Visuals might need adjustments for internationalization. Jeffy: Keep that in backlog.

tasks.title: Update onboarding help pages
tasks.description: Revise and update the existing help documentation related to user onboarding.
tasks.evidence: Mira: Regarding user support, is there a help doc update planned? Leah: Yes, updating onboarding help pages this week.

analysis_results.meeting_summary: The meeting focused on prioritizing the onboarding revamp for Q1 and pushing the advanced analytics pilot to March. Key outcomes included decisions for a silent onboarding launch, modular build, and numerous tasks assigned to prepare for an internal demo on Thursday, improve user experience, and manage internal expectations.
decisions: Onboarding revamp is the top priority for Q1.
The advanced analytics pilot is officially pushed to March.
The onboarding launch will be a silent update with no external marketing hype (no ads or blog posts).
Prioritize core onboarding steps first; extra features can wait.
Onboarding should be built as modular pieces to allow for easier future iterations and avoid rewrites.
